name: Kaylee Rivera
text: This pizza hut doesn't get lots of business however it is really delicious. I have been ordering from this pizza hut for over 5 years now and have had no problem with order mess ups or my food being cold or not properly cooked. The pizza â€¦More

name: Wesley Hall
text: Iam a truck driver. I wasn't 100% sure of my address location. She found me in a timely manner. Pizza was good! And to the beautiful delivery woman. I say many thanks!

name: Wayne T
text: Pizza soggy and moist. Workers are d***s and should be fired. No food ever plus the personal pizza is smaller than a cats turd. Oh yea one more thing, the random five stars are the workers doing that so they don't go out of business. Don't go to this pizza hut. EVER.

name: Sara Kaitlin
text: Would rate this place a 0. They don't know what they are doing. They are unprofessional. Do not get your Oder right. Do not care about the customers and are lazy. The food is cold. The prices are ridiculous .

name: Dawn Amareld
text: First we go in to pizza hut and the waitress says you eating in. We said yes. She say "pick a spot" then she gets our drink and we start looking at the menu. That wasn't to bad. Then another group walks in and they sit. Here's where it goes â€¦More

name: Sarah Tilakdharry
text: My mom went to pick up a pizza for dinner as she was shopping around the area. She waited for the pizza and was in no rush. She got the food fairly quickly. When she came home with it, there were cold spots and the dough was very soft and soggy.

name: Nashaly Benitez
text: They had two girls sitting on the counters and the cooks were wrestling and doing inappropriate things such as humping one another on the counter the servers name was Richard. Then on top of everything he lays my food on top of where the girls were sitting on top on the counter. Horrible service. So unprofessional.

name: Anthony Amati
text: The dining room was really strange they turned the light on for us no condiments on tables no garlic powder in the building the kid that waited on us was nice but definitely not a waiter brought the pizza and left we had to ask for silverware and plates

name: Skyler M
text: They got my orders wrong. I ordered twice and they didn't give me the right pizza twice and the rest of my order. They really deserve a 0 instead of a 1. Ugh. ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡

name: James Policastro
text: Worst Pizza Hut I have ever been too in my life.   Me and my Daughter went out for lunch.  And we get there, no one to seat us, finally a girl says grab a seat and if your getting the buffet get started.   So we go and there's one plate â€¦More

name: Amy Frances
text: Where to start? The place is beyond dirty... Dirty tables, dirty seats, and the high chairs look they haven't been cleaned in ten years. Our beadsticks tasted like cinnamon and the waiter didn't even bring us plates for our pizza. Stay clear of this one!

name: drona supersad
text: This place is terribly dirty, under staffed, rude staff. Everything you could mention wrong with a place, this pizza hut gets the prize. It's terrible and needs to be shut down, like now.

name: Enid Trejos
text: This is the worse pizza hut. We were waiting for our food for more than one hour. By the time it arrived it was cold. They didn't have regular 2 litter pepsi and we ended up with some kind of Mountain Dew in our table. We will never buy here again.

name: matthew Bennett
text: Pizza was cut like they had Parkinsons disease, and once the order arrived it was wrong missing items. The only good thing was the delivery driver who drove back and got our missing food. But thats the last time we order pizza hut.

name: Philip Porcaro
text: Quameer was a very good waiter the food was delicious we are very happy with stopping here don't believe all the bad post

name: stacey manzo
text: This pizza hut CONSTANTLY forgets all the sauces we PAY extra for.  Has also forgotten soda and an entire pizza before. I can understand if it happens once in a while BUT, it has happened the last 4 times we've ordered from here!! Get it together people!

name: Justin Trudouche
text: First off, I see alot of comments saying the only good reviews are employees of this Pizza hut. I AM NOT AN EMPLOYEE OF PIZZA HUT. However I am a huge Pizza hut fan, #1 fast food place in my book. I can see why some people had bad â€¦More

name: Britt Minnich
text: Eat in, hour wait for pizza to come out. Pizza was over cooked and dry. Side sauce was cold. Service poor to none. It will be a long time before I eat there again.

name: christopher hurst
text: As a critic I personally think the establishment should be shut down. It took you 40 minutes to deliver my uncooked food that I wasted 40 bucks on that taste repulsive. Someone should notify the health inspector.

name: Joseph Spingler
text: This place is total bull. I ordered online and it said by 9:14pm the order would be here. I call Oh we cancelled your order. This place can eat an ass. Never order here again..

name: Ashley Rose
text: I placed an order online and didnt recieve my food until a half hour AFTER the given arrival time. The food was cold and the pizza didnt even have the correct toppings. I called to speak with the manager about it, and all he did was â€¦More

name: Jennifer Shipp
text: Attempted to go for lunch today. Was turned away because they ran out of food. It was 12:21pm. They opened at 11am. No wonder they don't have any customers.

name: Justin Taylor
text: My server was rude, ignorant, and didnt even bother to offer us refills for our drinks and when she finally made it back to us we asked for refills and she rolled her eyes at us and just does not care about good service like im used to at the franklin mills pizza hut :/

name: David Nichols
text: Food was pretty good and staff are nice big shout out to the manager Jason for helping me pick what I wanted and the great customer service

name: Heather Murphy
text: Order my food at 6:50  app told me 7:20 delivery I live 1.5 miles away. It's 7:50 stil no pizza. Not the first time this has happened. Haven't ordered from here in months and now I'm not ordering here again. Want to kee your customers gonna have to try harder!

name: Jaimin Patel
text: Very bad to keep in promise. She told me to ready in 15 min and I waited for more then 45 min. No one there even ask you what happened to your order.... â€¦More

name: Wren Lynde
text: Dirty. Lack of service. Talking on their cell phones as well.  They are too busy doing take out to take care of customers in the dinning room. We love Pizza Hut but not at this location.

name: Mayur P
text: "DEAL CHEATERS" WE BYE ONE LARGE  I ASK FOR THERE IS ANY DEAL RIGHT NOW THEY SAID 10 $ ANY LARGE ANY ONE TOP THEY SAID LIKE THIS I BYE AND TAKE TO HOME MY WIFE SAID ABOUT THE DEAL FROM PIZZAHUT 6.65 $ FOR THE SAME LAGRE PIZZA I CALL THEM â€¦More

name: juan verdejo
text: Horrible ,I love pizza hut but this place shouldn't have the pizza hut name on it its not pizza hut taste,nasty just nasty

name: Ntr Lo0se
text: Excellent!! Ill b bac

name: zayzay rules
text: Absolutely terrible. I ordered at 7, And I'm still waiting. it's 8:30 now. The personal pizza is a little too personal. If you ever see this place and youre hungry, just go to McDonald's.

name: Mobile Gamer
text: The service is slow and the employees do not act professional in fact they almost fight and overall it is not a good place definitely recommend Chinese instead

name: Raymond A.C.E.
text: Terrible manners

name: Bill Sullivan
text: Absolutely horrible,

name: Steve Bembischew
text: Worst place ever. Do yourself a favor and take your business elsewhere. Untrained and unprofessional employees.

name: Justin Boylan
text: Horrible place just avoid the headache and waste of money and go somewhere else please..

name: BJ Bergey
text: Hit or miss experience

name: Rebecca Polcino
text: Worst place in history

name: Joey Viglianese
text: This pizza hut should actually be shut down. I have nothing else to say.

name: Spooky Ghost
text: Often order the delivery when I got friends over.  Eating at the Pizza Hut isn't the best experience but I only done it once.

name: Michael Peters
text: Pizza Hut isn't good as far as I'm concerned. My wife occasionally has a craving and asks me to pick up food from here. Every time that I've been in, the service is slow and the food is underwhelming.

name: J Jj
text: Very good service

name: Jenny Nesbitt
text: This pizza hut is the worst I have been waiting for my pizza for 2 hours their service sucks I will not be coming back at all .

name: Tiffany Watkins
text: Doesn't taste like Pizza Hut Pizza
